charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to Import 5 Kilograms or more of Cocaine. Penalty : 10 Years to Life of  Imprisonment, not more than a $ 10,000,000.00 fine, $ 100.00 Special Assessment, at least 5 Years up to a Life Term of Supervised Release.(1)

Importation of 5 Kilograms or more of Cocaine. Penalty : 10 Years to Life of  Imprisonment, not more than a $ 10,000,000.00 fine, $ 100.00 Special Assessment, at least 5 Years up to a Life Term of Supervised Release.(2)

Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute 5 Kilograms or more of Cocaine. Penalty : 10 Years to Life of  Imprisonment, not more than a $ 10,000,000.00 fine, $ 100.00 Special Assessment, at least 5 Years up to a Life Term of Supervised Release.(3)

Possess with intent to distribute 5 kilograms or more of cocaine. Penalty : 10 Years to Life of  Imprisonment, not more than a $ 10,000,000.00 fine, $ 100.00 Special Assessment, at least 5 Years up to a Life Term of Supervised Release.(4)
